attributes.action: restore the empty property rate relief, which it is able to do within the existing legislation that came into effect on 1st April 2008.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Taxing property owners or tenants with a lease that have had to close due to economic downturn brought on by factors outside the traders control must be morally wrong. The decision to remove it is penalising small firms and business owners alike that, due to no fault of their own are now unable to trade in current adverse trading conditions.

In what must be considered as a deteriorating economy by the day, the changes must be adding to the current financial difficulties – the Government must take time out to understand that they should not collect tax on zero earnings
